text:
Kota ki dosti Kota m hi reh jaati hai: Iska counter example hai apna. Kitna padhaku tha bhai, woh chashme ki frame aur woh massom sa face... mai toh sochta tha kitna padta hoga yeh banda... 
Phir iit m branch bhi saath m mili. Saath m jhela hai profs ko yrr... yeh koi choti baat hai!!! 
Abhi bhi jab tuje dekhta hu, Mereko toh yahi lgta hai- kitna padta hoga yrr yeh banda.. :)
Kota se Kanpur tak aur aasha krtu aage tak saath rahega.
All the best bro!!
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Namaste Bhaiyaji!
Safar aur suffer krte krte yeh samay bhi aa gaya ki memoir likh rahe hai. First year m drameve 1, NSS nukkad, galaxy... itna sab krke bhi muje nahi jaan paye, jo muje drameve 1 (2nd year) me gaana sikhane k liye bhej diya tha bhai :|
Hum m toh hall feeling hamesha se rahi hai pr teri toh sirf galaxy m nikalti thi, woh bhi thodi thodi ü§™ü§™. Baaki aapke sarcasm level k toh sab dewane hai, pr mai shyaad uska shikar tha ü§£ü§£, pata nahi!!!
Kuch chize tera naam lete hi aakho k saamne aa jati hai- woh mota ‡§™‡•á‡§ü - Businessman (bithoor se jab wapis aa rahe toh beech m koi apartment dikhaye the tune.. bola tha yeh humare pitaji k hai!!) - Whiteboard jisme GSOC likha tha- awesome Drummer - and obiviously Sutttts buddy- antragini ka ghooskhor head ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£.
Waise ek baat yaad dilado ki jo bithoor ki photo daali hai, usme mai bhi tha... camere k iss side nahi uss side.. ü§™ü§™ pr chaiye koisi bhi side ho... asha krte hai ki aap ka jeevan sukhad rahe.. ALL the best bhai!!
And ofcourse milenge jaldi!!
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text: Roommate from another wing (brother from another mother typess), or apni maa toh hall 2 hi thi ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è. Pr bhai ek baaat toh hai, bistar pr pade pade kaafi stambh gaad liye aapne. Kabhi fursat ho to iska raaz jarror batana. Baaki aage liye best of luck.. dua m yaad rakhna....  üòéüòé
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text: Aur Moteee kya kr raha hai!!!! Ek baat ka hamesha se dukh raha hai, teri gpl nahi le saka yrr... Pr sabse fadu incident apan ka toh pranav joshi wala tha!! Kya moment tha yrr woh toh.. Baaki bhai maje toh khoob kiye, wing ho, ME/TA202 ki lab ho, canteen ho... Aise hi rahiyo bhai befikar ekdum and Best of luck aage k liye bhai!!!
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Tera Mann ne tere se first year m yahi bola hoga na: It is better ki tum chatur ramlingam (C-bot wale) k saath shift ho jao, iss randhodas (C-TOP) k saath rahoge toh kuch nahi kr pooge. 
Commentry: Phir kya, Raju( tu) ne rail ko dabba badal diya aur naye S-U-F-F-E-R pr nikal gaya... 

Bhut jyada chill adami tha bhai tu, bistar pr pada reheta tha, NSS jata tha... yahi yaade hai mere pass, iske baad toh tum wing-dhrohi saabhit ho gaye aur tumhara wing-nikala ho gaya!!
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Agar koi Y17 m sabse alag hai toh woh hai tu. Age: 15 m cllg m entry, Branch: MTH, Passion: Chindigiri aur kanjoosi, Baap: Sakeri (Hehe..), Romie: Rochak... (JD toh sahi hai...), 1st year m dramatics kiya, baaki k saalo m RR (Haan sahi suna RR), and the ACTING cultural secretary... Aur toh Aur summer play m do scene (WOW!!!)  
Aisa combination kahin dekhne ko nahi milega. Baaki Orcale m bhut ladkiya milegi.. aur UPSC kro toh batana (aise hi bol raha hu, mai nahi krne wala). 
Kro mast ekdum coding, mileneg kabhi, all the best bhai!!!
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text: katre bhai... you are from california right? Bahi bhut majje kiye yrr apan ne toh.. college m hi nahi lockdown m bhi... bhut baate thoki hai. Pe ek wish hai jo adhuri reh gayi... koi ek toh lab krni thi tere saath.. bhai lab band krva ke nikalte. Pr bade harami ho beta! aur yeh wahi feel kr payega jo tere saath samay guzarega...
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text: Oye suno be, galaxy m dance trophy chaiye... bss... Do bate hai, ek jisse soch k lagta hai tere jaisa banna hai, aur dusri dekh k lagta hai nahi banna bhai tere jaisa... pheli toh yeh hai bhai tum sare sports khel kaise lete ho, aur dance bhi kr lete ho... body ho toh aisi ho, vrna jinda toh.... aur dusri baat toh aapko pata hi hogi :)
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Hello Ji...
Pheli baar mulakat hui thi unn thand bhari raato m, jab pet mai chuhe kuda krte the aur DOAA canteen k bhaiya unhe shaant kiya krte the. Tab toh tuje hindi bhi nahi aati thi saath me. Yuhi milna jhula chalta raha tha second year Antaragni tak jab raakhi ka prastav nahi aaya... woh din hai aur aaj ka din hai!!!

Kisse toh sahi m kam nahi hai... college m bada hua wing m, jeena sikhaya dramatics ne, pr life m jo adventures aaye hai, usme hamesha tera haath tha...

1. SSAC: irada bura nahi tha pr washroom m bag bhulna teri hi galti thi... jiska course ka paper tha, usi ke notes the yrr... DOSA ne confession likhyava tha mere se.. pr end m kuch nahi hua.. hehe.. 

2. IITB: Woh mumbai ki thandi thandi hava kisme jal gaye the hum, nahi bhul sakta mai.

3. Amrita + Savitri: Best part of life. Yeh do plays ki jagah mere jeevan m alag hai. Dono m hi meri fan thi tu... Amrita ne bhi mere ko support kiya aur Savitri toh naam se aur kaam se, dono se Savitri thi... Aur aisa hi kuch kirdar mere asal jeevan m bhi raha hai!!!

4. MTH m dual: yeh pata nahi kyu hua, kaise hua, pr ho gaya. Maine socha tha Data Science krunga pr yeh toh dhoka ho gaya mere saath

5. Intern nahi lagi yrr: Yeh samay toh kaise kata hai, yaad krta hu toh lgta hai, apun hi bhagvaan hai!!  

Aur bhut saare kisse hai. Multipurpose k bahar 1st and 7th scene ki practice krna. yaad hai tere ko lucknow airport lene aaye the.. itne saare gifts diye hai (aur mere kaafi pending bhi hai, jaldi hi saare krta hu)... treats toh itni kri hai pucho mat... woh drameve 2 m kutte bane the- govinda govinda govinda  govinda  govinda  govindaaaaaa......

Pr ek baat mai bata du, tere ko data science ka bhut mere se hi laga hai, yeh baat apne baccho ko bhi batana..  (2 saal lead krne ka ghamand nahi le sakta, toh iss baat ka hi le leta hu..)

Abhi ek saal aur hai campus, acche se enjoy kro, research paper chhapo (inti intern, inte projects ka kya kregi jetti), naukri lagavao croreo ki.... phir saath m treat krenge...

Isi tarah yaad krte rehena, milte rehena on every stage of my life!!

OSTWAL
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Khem cho mota bhai!!! Apna vasta keval branch aur wing ka hi nahi balki Gujrat tak hai bhai!!! 
Wing m bhi bhut majje kiye, woh first m gpl lene chale the meri, khud k hi lagvali (Powerful toh hu mai). Aur Mech m toh kya hi bolu, Jai siya raam... Itni ‡§ú‡§æ‡§≤‡§∏‡§æ‡§ú‡§º‡•Ä toh kahin nahi kri hogi... aur toh aur amruta ko bhi saath m jhela hai yrr..... :(. 
Aur kya kr rahe ho?? Coding?? Java m... yeah chapuu. Aise hi code krke Morgan m machate rehena. Baaki volleyball khelne toh mai aa hi jaunga mumbai :) 
All the best bhai!!!
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Yo, buddy!!!
Placement ki woh raate... ratee chodo woh coding ke test.... yeh kisse toh jitni baar yaad kro, kabhi purane nahi hote.!!! Waise, Bilkul sahi kaha, der aaye durust aaye, college khtm hua hai, aage life toh bhut bacchi hai majje krne k liye.
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Aur koki man.. profile photo dekh hi majja aa gaya...  Smj nahi aa raha kya likhu. Chalo, mai ochi baat krte hue thodi taarif kr hi deta hu.... kuch cheeze hai jo mere ko tere se seekhi thi yrr, ya kaho apne jeevan m absorb krni thi, sabse phele toh fitness bhai.. gajab fitness freak ho yrr.. aise hi doudte rehena... Dusra bhai KITABE.. isme toh m jaldi hi barabari krne wala hu.... 
IMP BAAT ki 1 saal se upar ho gaya, chalo coordinator banne wala credit hum tumhe de hi dete hai(dil pr bhut bada patthar rakh rakha hai)
Baaki bhai ek play krte yrr saaath m, majja aata (Yaseen...ye tumhara kam hai na) (kitni overacting krta hai yrr....)   Aur bhai aage milte hai saath mai Nolan ki picture dekhenge, aage ke liye bhut saara best of luck (jo kroge badiya hi kroge bhai)...
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
#NotMyPresident
Pheli baar kab mile the yeh toh yaad nahi, pr kaand toh bhut kiye hai saath m. Phir woh galaxy k liye laundo ko lana ho hall 13 se, lalkaar gana ho, president banna ho, dramatic club urf nanhe mujyaadeen ne hamesha aapka saath diya hai... aur khaskar godfather ne. Aur haan yeh mai aaj keh dete hu aapne hall sahi sambhal liya tha, proud of you...

Tera whatapp status kaafi suit krta hu, Diplomatic Nonsense. Won instance..... coding nahi ho rahi bhai... NAHI KROGE TOH NAHI HOGi... great words man..  

But yr woh plants muje room m hi chhod k aane pade. Last m bhut chaos ho gaya tha. Pr ball maine abhi tak toh sambhal k rakhi hai... aage bhi rakh lunga.  bss iss baat ka afssos hai ki campus tour nahi kr paaye jaate jaate... 

Baaki chennai jao.. aai yaai yo kro.. aur 2 states waali story jaisa kuch kro yrr... Aur toh bhai aasha krta hu ki jaldi hi milnge...
#NotMyPresident
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Tere bare m likhne k liye bhi maal ka hawan aur daaru ka bhoj lagvana padega. Tu shuru krte hai
JAI bholenaath!!!
tere ko dekh mere ko ek scene yaad aata hai- Tu- mai- kunal ü§™ü§™ kya phaat k 16 ho  jaati thi teri. awaz nahi nikalti thi brooo.....
Baaki tere kaand toh bhut jyada hai, aur bhut logo ne bhut kuch likh bhi diya hoga. Bhale ladki ho, gym ho, nasha ho, acting ho (smj gaya na konsi acting), ra*di rona ho..... chodo inn sab bato ko. 
Pr bhai ne majje bhut karaye hai. Bhale woh december ka samay ho... ya facebook ü§™. (the meme lord).. 
Bhai isi tarah se chillness baat te rehena... aur mauka mile toh Jang m jane se phele iss typewriter urf Anand se jaroor milna!!
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Tere ko toh MOTI k naam hi bulane ka mann krta hai pr kaam DIDI wale krti hai. Bhut kuch kr liya yrr tune 4 saalo mai... aur at the end badiya se naukri bhi lagvali. 
Safar ki shuruat hui thi drameve 1 se. Apna toh roll number bhi pass m tha. 
Dekho meri phele ladkiyo se bhut phatt ti thi (aur abhi bhi thodi thodi hai). Orientation k time pr jab tune pheli bar naam pucha tha, tab bhi bhut gandi phati thi!! :| :|
Pr phir chill ho gaya, nukkad kiya, DOAA m chill mara, birthday pr Hall 10 m thus thus k maggi khai!!
Jab coordinator bane toh, ek baat bata fraud mara na tune, kuki saath m antragini bhi kr li.. sahi bata!!! mereko toh lgta tha, bhut fraud mara tum logo ne. 
Aur end m ek course bhi kr liya saath mai. Prof ka naam lene se hi munna bhaiya yaad aa jaye hai, kaan ko hilate hue :) :).
Abb udaipur mai aaunga toh batata hu... milenge kabhi!!
All the best yrr!!
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Aur FRAUDY NANA!!! (yeh naam ka ek medal bana k khud ko phena de...)
Aao kuch naam yaad krte hai: NANA - Fraudy - DJ Khalid - Samartha - Joru ka ghulam - Kanjoos - Latelatif.
Kahini shuru hui thi orientation k uss stage se jaha tune nana ki mimicry kri thi. Apna nukkad bhale alag tha drameve1 pr koi na!!! Antragini saath kri, NSS nukkad saath kiya, drameve 2 bhi saath kiya... aur aise hi saath krte krte coordinator ban gaye.
Tere woh wala kissa bada yaad aata hai jab Anindya ne tereko tapli mari thi. üòÇüòÇ 
Saath toh apan woh EE wali lab bhi kri thi... bhai pata nahi kya kya krte the usme toh.. ek sahi banda tha jo aake bata deta tha!! 
Saath m choreo karaya, jai jai shiv shankar wala step kiya.. but tu sahi krta tha yrr... Abb chapu, backchod toh tune apne bio m likh hi diya hai, toh mereko lagta nahi ki yaha isse related kuch instances mention krne ki jaroorat hai.. ku sahi kaha na??? üòÇ
Sabse jyada majja aaya bhai third year galaxy ka play... usme bhai onstage jo shukla aur tune kiya.. bhaisaab... woh impromt toh bhul hi nahi sakta mai. 
Same hall, same branch, same club, phir bhi bhut mushkilo haath lagta tha tu. Pata kaha gyaab reheta hai. 
Aage Aise kayab mt rehena bhai.
Aage k liye All the best bhai.
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Hey Babes! How you doing... Aasha krta hu ki aapka taste jald se jald sudhar jaaye. Yaad hai muje woh din ki sulagti dhoop, jisme me aap mann m CS Branch ki aasha liye, HARALAMBOS aur ek pencil haath m liye to-and fro motion kiya krte the.. what a dedication (Salute!!). Yeh bhi ek reason tha apan shuruat k saalo m jyada ghul mil nahi paaye... but thanks to Yogi. 
Ek cheeze jo muje pasand aayi aapke baare m- College se jaate jaate har ek cheez try krke jana hai.. bilkul sahi decision tha... I hope majja toh bhut aaya hoga!!! Aise hi enjoy krte rehena... jeevan k dobara mulakat Jaroor hogi, isi asha k saath, enjoy buddy and All the best!!!
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text: Abb kya likhu mai, saath m hi toh chal rahe hai PUNE. Bhale hi 3 saal saath m kuch na kiya ho, ek DS ki class k alawa, 4 th year m saath m chaap hi diya. Aur aage bhi chaapte rehenge bhai.... Ek kaam krte hai, Logo ko bolte hai ki woh apn dono ki Memoir m likhe taaki kisi weekend pr apan kahin chatt pr baithe ho, aur hawa sungte sungte inn bato ko yaad kreke majje kre....
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Kitna Masoom hai yeh Chehera.... Sabse massom insan agar koi IIT Kanpur hai toh aa ho bhai. Itni politeness kaha se late ho iss mad-cho dhuniya mai!!
Drameve 1 mai mile the but mime m chale gaye, tab se the mime-person ki image bani hui mere dimmag mai. Pr yeh judaai jyada din chali nahi.. Kismat likha tha mila, toh milenege hi na bhai.. upar se branch bhi same!!
But thoda sa mad-cho toh bann sakte ho bhai.. Kaam aayega aage...
Aage se yaad aya... stay in touch bhai!! All the best...
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
Drameve 2, first year ki baat hai, sab gola bana k baithe the foyer m aur kuch kuch pradarshan chal raha tha, achanak ek naam aaya aur sabhi hall 12 wale unison m bole "katiyaar". Tab pheli bar dekha tha. Patla sa lakdi jaisa!!

Kaafi 4 saal k kaam hai jo tune already gina diye hai, jo maine kiya. But I have some "dosti k pal" type moments jisme sirf tu ya sirf mai nahi, hum dono saath m hai.

isme sabse phele meri list m hai, 3rd year aur Hall 1 woh kone wala room. Aahhh uss room m jake kya machaya tha bhai apan ne. Jane se phele gaali dete hai, aur room se nikal ne k baad. pr at the end jyada kuch change nahi hone diya. kitna lade the yr...

Abb yeh likha hai toh mai play ko kaise bhul sakta hu. Uss play se ek judav sa ho gaya tha yrr.. halaki waisa character connection accha nahi tha, pr woh samay ki alag se jagah hai mere mann me.

Aur yeh likh liya tha mai Devaashish Misra ko kaise bhul sakta hu.. aur uska chela. Aadmi sahi tha pr apan ko under estimate krke chala gaya. 

uske baad hai volleybaal, H2 vs H12, majja hi aa jata tha bhai. Obiviously kabhi kabhi saath m bhi khela krte the. But most imp raat ko 8 se subha ki 4 tak khela krte the...

uske baad toh bhai ek scene yaad aata hai, tu, bottle or woh raat.... :) :) 

Majja toh play padhne m bhi aaya tha, B-115, Cooler, aur apan teen... play padh k discuss krte the... woh ek discussion hai jo mai miss krunga.. do karan ke PLAY, dusra apni ‡§§‡§ø‡§ó‡•ú‡•Ä 

Woh orientation bhi yaad hai jaha tu marne ki halat m pauch gaya tha... bhai thoda diet pt dhyaan do... lockdown k baad ek tu hi tha jo weight na gain kiya na loose... Thoda bhara bhara rahega toh accha lagega!! (Shyaad yahi karan tha ki muje PG m intro lena pada tha, aur maine huggg diya :( )

Bombay ki raate.. thandi hawa.. Monoact k liye phata phaat music dhoodna.. samundar ki woh lehera yaha fursat mandli ki shirt m photo keechai thi, juhu chaupati pe theekha teekha khana... aur woh LAMBHIII Raat.

Yaad hoga hi tere ko, Lucknow gaye the... play lene... woh library bhut badiya thi yrr.. koi Stanin laoski krke tha jiska direction ki kitabe pada krte the waha aur kunal bhi....

EK aur moment hai jo yaad rahega, third year galaxy... play direct kiya apan dono ne.. jayada saath m the nahi pr, Hall 3 walo ka slot chaiye tha.. hehe... majje toh leliye the... lucknow m woh jagah ka naam toh yaad nahi, pr mahal m idhar udhar se gaye the, upar gaye the, photo keechai thi... 

Apan dono k beech ki constant kadi thi jetti, uska yaha yaad kr lena chaiye. Stage ho, life ho, hamesha saath m milti woh...

Bss yahi kuch yade hai jo sametna chahunga, muje pata hai iske alawa bhut saare aise instances hai toh tu muje yaad dilana chalega iss point pe, jaha maine thodi... ch*dali thi!!! Dil ka accha insan hai bhai tu, infact bhut accha, pr kahin bar Kaalidas aur vilom ho jata hai :| :|. Aur haan BT bhut leta hai (Bss yeh request kr raha hu ki thoda kam kro isko). 

Aur abhi toh ek saal aur baccha hai iitk ka! Enjoy krna bhai...aur research bhi :)

Touch me rehene ki puri koshish krunga... aur milenge jabhi na kabhi... zindagi ke raaste takrayenge jaroor!!!

-Ostwal
author: Aayush  Ostwal

text:
‡§î‡§∞ BRO ... ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§π‡•à?
‡§ö‡§≤‡•ã Best Friend ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß ‡§≤‡§ø‡§ñ‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡•§

Rochak ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ù‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç Generation Gap ‡§π‡•à‡•§ 
... 
... 
Isse jyada abb mai kya hi bolu.. kaafi kuch waise tune mere memoir mai likh diya hai... jisme dramatics k saare events toh aa hi gaye hai... Toh yaha wing aur branch k kuch anoke kisse daal raha hu (last m thodi taarif bhi likhi hai, lekhak ka bhavarth ko smjna...)

Phele toh bhai, tu antragini first year m select nahi hu (nahi toh aur majja aata), pr practice k baad woh raat ko drum bajana aur TA ki drawing banana... aise hi nikale hai apne courses... Aur toh aur ART105 ki video mai bhi BRO ka contribution tha... PE mai bhi saath jate the, Blue shirt pehen ke.

First year me GPL lena ka toh alag craze tha (jo aakhri saal tak chala), Bhut G-P-L di hai bhai tere toh. Phir finally December mai muje ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•É‡§§ ‡§∞‡§∏ - ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó 1 mila. Pr ek baat hai, Squash mai tune meheat toh kri thi, mera aerobics toh bhut chill tha.. (That how, mere number tere phone m save hue!!)

NSS ka NUKKAD: Bye god, yeh harkat hamesha yaad rahegi... kya mast mohla insan the uss time pr... Akbar Birbal ko uss din apni kitabo me amar kr diya... 

TA202 Ki lAB: Bye god, yeh bhi nahi bhulne wala mai... SCAVENGER.. kya mast banaya tha... aur saath m uss lab m kaam krna, AutoCAD banana... woh grease k haath rin saboon se ghis ghis k dhona... woh koisa BABU tha na, usse kya phatt tee thee. hai raam.. dosti k pal, bhulaye nahi bhulte...

Aur isi k saath chalu hua, Konsa DC le raha hai bhai, Konsa HSS lu yrr, Sare DE ch*tiye hai... Mech alawa shyaad CSO203 hi saath m kiya hoga na apan ne.. Baaki sare DE aur DC toh kre hi hai... Anindya Chaterjee, Venky, Ishan Sharma, ME222 wala khargosh, woh 321 wala kone wala lab ka TA... oh bhai bhut lambi list hai pr yeh list toh grade sheet dekhne se yaad aa jayegi.. hehe...

Phir aaya December jisme muje ‡§Ö‡§Æ‡•É‡§§ ‡§∞‡§∏ - ‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó 2  mila... aaahhhh... Waise second year me toh toh mai thoda alag level pr chala gaya tha... bss classes mai mila krte the... 

Third year toh bhai, coordinator, bothra aur tera scene hi yaad aata hai jaha soni tere se better kr raha tha :)... yeh wala saal 2nd se bhut better tha... Antaragni jeet gaye, MIME m chaap diya bhai (Chapu mime karai thi)...

text:
Let us try to summarize your college life in few words: Modi, Kholi, Matlabi, Chapu (Yeh nahi khena chaiye tha), bin painde ka lota (Civil->Mech->CS). Bade harami ho beta. Bhagvaan kre tumhaari naukri lage badiya se aur aur chutti hi na mile. 
Pr bhai inn sab sacchai ko alag rakh kr kuch joothi baate kr lete hai. Chapu the bhai tum..!!! (Aur fit bhi). Tere jaisa chill banda dekha nahi jo apna assignment kisi ko deta nahi. (Dono baate kitni contradicting hai yrrr...) Baaki cricket match ki bet ki cahi bacchi hui hai...(Jab milenge pila dena)
Thoda harkate sudharlena aapni algli baar milne se phele.. baaki abhi jo adobe m chapo.. and Best of L(F)UCK!!!
